values: Why Expositional Preaching Is Particularly Glorifying to GodWhy Expositional Preaching Is Particularly Glorifying to God

Preaching is not conversation or discussion. It’s not casual talk about religious things. Preaching is heralding a message permeated by the sense of God’s greatness.Preaching is not conversation or discussion. It’s not casual talk about religious things. Preaching is heralding a message permeated by the sense of God’s greatness.
